snippet: The Islanders captain John Tavares scored a hat trick and added an assist to help propel his team to a 7-3 victory over the visiting Dallas Stars.
abstract: New York Islanders captain John Tavares scores a hat trick and adds an assist to help propel his team to a 7-3 victory over visiting Dallas Stars.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders captain John Tavares scored a hat trick and added an assist to help propel his team to a 7-3 victory over the visiting Dallas Stars.
